patterns: What should I eat if want to lose weight?

responses: For weight loss, focus on a high-protein, low-calorie diet with lots of vegetables, lean meats, and healthy fats.
Some great low-calorie foods include leafy greens, lean proteins like chicken and fish, Greek yogurt, and fibrous fruits like berries.
A balanced diet for fat loss includes lean protein (chicken, fish, tofu), complex carbs (quinoa, brown rice), and healthy fats (avocados, nuts).
To lose weight effectively, eat nutrient-dense, whole foods while avoiding processed sugars and excess saturated fats.
Reduce sugar and refined carbs while increasing fiber intake from vegetables, whole grains, and legumes to support fat loss.
